fields.question: HOW WILL MY ORDER BE PACKAGED/POSTED?
fields.answer: For packaging our products we use compostable tissue paper to wrap the artwork before placing it inside a clear, sturdy plastic bag. We also place cardboard or foam corner protectors at the corners of the tightly wrapped painting to provide cushioning and additional protection.

fields.question: DO YOU HAVE GIFT PACKAGING OPTIONS?
fields.answer: All items contain the option to add wrapping, a gift box or bag, a decorative ribbon, and a printed card with a gift message. Email @... after your order has been placed to include gift packaging options
